noun.description: A place, amenity, or piece of equipment provided for a particular purpose.
examples: facilities for picnicking, camping, and hiking

noun.description: An ability to do or learn something well and easily; a natural aptitude.
examples: he had a facility for languages

origin: Early 16th century (denoting the means or unimpeded opportunity for doing something): from French facilité or Latin facilitas, from facilis easy (see facile).
